title: Bootstrap-styled login page with email and password

requirements.text: Create a dedicated login page UI that contains a Bootstrap-styled form with the following fields: Email (type=email) and Password (type=password), plus a primary “Log in” submit button.

quotes: Create HTML login page using Bootstrap with email and password.

acceptanceCriteria: Login page renders a form with an email input, password input, and a submit button
Inputs use appropriate HTML input types (email/password)

requirements.text: Include Bootstrap in the frontend so the login page renders with Bootstrap styles without requiring any manual CSS setup by the user.

quotes: Create HTML login page using Bootstrap with email and password.

acceptanceCriteria: Bootstrap CSS is loaded in the app at runtime
Login page styling visibly reflects Bootstrap defaults (e.g., form controls/buttons spacing and appearance)

requirements.text: Apply a consistent visual theme for the login page (spacing, typography, and layout) that complements Bootstrap, using a warm neutral palette (avoid blue/purple) and a centered card layout.
acceptanceCriteria: Login form is centered on the page and presented in a card-like container
The page uses a warm neutral background and consistent spacing/typography
No blue/purple-dominant theme colors are used

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or anything under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them instead if needed).
nonGoals: Implementing actual authentication logic (backend login, session management, token storage, etc.)
Adding third-party auth providers (only Internet Identity is supported on this platform)
Adding sign-up, forgot-password, or profile management flows
